title: An old video falsely shared as recent Ram Navami celebrations in Akbarpur block (UP) during lockdown
subtitle: The same video was posted by a Facebook page on 14 April 2019. So, the event in the video happened much before the coronavirus outbreak and the imposition of lockdown in the country.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it shows this year Ram Navami celebrations in Akbarpur block (UP) despite the lockdown in the country. FACTLY has found that the same video is on the internet at least since April 2019 and is from Akbarpur of Bihar. So, the video is not related to any recent event and was taken much before the lockdown.

Did you watch our new video?
